name: Assorted Fade++ Fixes
description: Fixes a bunch of things wrong with Fade++ Meant to be used alongside Fade++ obviously - Adds the container background for the videos on the subscriptions page (like on the homepage) - Fixes the playlist page - Improvements to the video page ├- Removed a -20px margin on the primary container. Should properly center now. └- Added proper handling for different size windows. There were missing margin rules etc. Some of these changes attempt to override Fade++ !important rules with my own !important rules. So my rules need to be loaded into the DOM first. As far as I know the order the styles are installed determines the load order. i.e. You might need to install this style first, then Fade++

discussions.name: This is exactly what I needed for fade to work, thank you!
